faqs.question: How long does it take to develop a project?
faqs.answer: Timelines vary depending on the project's complexity. A landing page can be ready in 2â€“3 weeks, while a complete application may take 8â€“12 weeks. We always provide a detailed schedule before starting.

faqs.question: What does post-launch support include?
faqs.answer: Our support includes bug fixes, security updates, data backups, basic monitoring, and technical assistance. The support period varies based on the package (1â€“6 months included).

faqs.question: Can I make changes during development?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We work with an agile methodology that allows adjustments throughout the process. Minor changes are included, while major modifications are assessed on a case-by-case basis.

faqs.question: Do you offer a warranty on your work?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day warranty against malfunctions after launch. In addition, all our projects include a free technical support period.

faqs.question: How do you handle intellectual property?
faqs.answer: Once payment is completed, all intellectual property of the project (code, designs, content) is 100% yours. We deliver all source files and full documentation.

faqs.question: Do you work with companies from other countries?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with clients worldwide. We have experience in international projects and adapt to different time zones to facilitate communication.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We use modern and proven technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, among others. We choose the best technology based on each projectâ€™s specific needs.

faqs.question: Can I see examples of past work?
faqs.answer: Of course. We have a portfolio with detailed case studies of projects like helloflatmate, viaje seguro, and clean net. We can show you similar examples during the initial consultation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer your questions about our professional web development service

questions.question: How long does it take to develop a website?
questions.answer: The development time depends on the complexity of the project. For standard websites, our usual timeframe is 3 to 5 weeks from design approval to launch. More complex projects like e-commerce or custom platforms may take longer. During the initial planning phase, we will provide you with a detailed timeline tailored to your project.

questions.question: What do I need to provide to start the project?
questions.answer: To get started, we need to understand your business goals, target audience, and design preferences. It helps if you can provide: your logo and brand identity (if available), examples of websites you like, content (texts and images) for the site, and any specific requirements. Donâ€™t worry if you donâ€™t have everything readyâ€”weâ€™ll guide you through the process and can offer content creation services if needed.

questions.question: How do you help my site appear on Google?
questions.answer: We implement a comprehensive SEO strategy from the ground up. This includes technical optimisation (site structure, loading speed, metadata), content optimisation (strategic keywords, content structure), and analytics setup. All our websites are mobile-friendly and comply with Google's guidelines for good ranking. We also offer ongoing SEO services to progressively improve your visibility.

questions.question: Will I be able to update the content myself?
questions.answer: Absolutely! All our websites come with intuitive content management systems that let you update text, images, products, and more without technical knowledge. We also provide personalised training and documentation so you can confidently manage your site. For more advanced updates, you can always rely on our technical support.

questions.question: What does website maintenance include?
questions.answer: Our maintenance plans include: regular security updates, periodic backups, performance monitoring, email support, small content updates, and monthly performance and traffic reports. Maintenance is crucial to ensure your site remains secure, fast, and up-to-date with the latest technologies and web standards.

questions.question: Do you work with companies in Lisbon and surrounding areas?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with companies in Lisbon and throughout Portugal, as well as international clients. We offer in-person meetings for local clients and video calls for remote ones. Our work methodology ensures smooth communication and outstanding results regardless of location.
